item.description:
http://www.libertylovefest.com/

Join us for a celebration of epic proportions!

New England Liberty LOVE Fest
8th Floor, 18 Grafton Street, Worcester, Massachusetts

... Saturday April 28, 2012.

DOORS OPEN @ 2PM

Musical performances by: Jordan Page, Rebel Inc. Tatiana Moroz, The Federal Crime, Leaders Led, Justin Roy, Smiley Chris & Andrea Pisani

Speakers include: Adam Kokesh, Gary Franchi, Danny Panzella, Dave Kopacz, Carla Gericke, Daniel Gordan, Anthony Antonello & Gigi Bowman

Contributing Artists: Adrienne Martino, Jon Allen & Andrew Fahey

*Suggested $25 donation at the door

For more information email us @ LibertyLOVEfest@live.com
